problem.markdown:
>>Which feature in Query Editor should you use to transform selected columns into attribute-value pairs where columns become rows?<<
( ) Fill ( ) Reverse Rows (x) Unpivot Columns ( ) Merge Columns
[explanation] Using the Unpivot Columns feature you can transform selected columns into attribute-value pairs, where the columns become the rows. [explanation]
